professional_summary: QA Engineer with extensive experience in software development and testing, including performance, functional, integration, system, regression, and user acceptance testing. Proficient in Ruby on Rails, PHP, Python, Scrum, Agile methodologies, Selenium, Jenkins, Test Automation, and TestRail. Committed to process improvement and streamlining project issues.

key_responsibilities: and Ruby on Rails for test automation.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to resolve project issues and streamline processes.
Adjusting customer-requested code for the loyalty program.
Revising code to update customer locations.
Assisting QA with acceptance testing and system documentation.
Setting up and configuring new assessments using MySQL and DBVisualizer.
Managing and pushing SOAP feed updates monthly.
000 SKU's of diamond bits across 13 global distribution centers.
Optimizing inventory levels using statistical models to reduce on-hand inventory by approximately $4 million.
Applying lean manufacturing to reduce lead times from three weeks to seven days.
